cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.MA, cs.SI. 

This paper discusses the use of probability-based reasoning systems in belief revision, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also touches on the limitations of the Bayesian approach, which is a popular method in information theory (cs.IT) and mathematical analysis (cs.MA). Finally, the paper discusses the need for proper distinctions between belief revision and belief updating, which is a topic in social and information sciences (cs.SI).
